lead_paragraph: A team mate of Japanese badminton Olympic medal hope Kento Momota on Friday confessed to taking the world number two-ranked player to an illegal casino and tearfully begged officials to allow the star to compete at the Rio de Janeiro Games.

headline.print_headline: Tearful Tago Wants Mercy for Momota Over Casino Visit
headline.main: Tearful Tago Wants Mercy for Momota Over Casino Visit
